text: Brian Edward Sandoval (born August 5, 1963) is an American politician. He was the 29th Governor of the U.S. state of Nevada from 2011 to 2019. He is a member of the Republican Party. Sandoval is a former judge of the United States District Court for the District of Nevada. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American judges Category:Governors of Nevada Category:Politicians from California Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Brian Sandoval
